title: Explore dual anti-inflammatory and cell protective mechanisms the mechanism of Jianwei Yuyang tablet in the treatment of alcohol-induced gastric ulcers via bioinformatics and experimental validation.
abstract: Jianwei Yuyang Tablet (JWYY), a Chinese herbal formulation, has been approved for the treatment of various gastric diseases in clinic and has demonstrated significant therapeutic effects in patients with multiple types of gastric ulcers (GU).
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
